testcase.classname: Login page Automation of saucedemo App
testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid creds - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters valid "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"...................passed And Clicks on Login Button..................................................passed Then User is navigated to Home Page.........................................passed And Close the browser.......................................................passed
